EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
VESSEL, 68 PERSONS ON BOARD, IN NEED OF ASSISTANCE
IN 33-58.8N 012-55.8E AT 271652Z MAR. VESSELS
IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
PHONE: 390 6592 4145 OR 3906 5908 4409,
FAX: 390 6592 2737 OR 3906 5908 4793,
E-MAIL: UFFICIO3.REPARTO3@MIT.GOV.IT.
